channel.title: I have portforwarded and my No-IP does'nt work [help]
channel.description:
Hi, I have portforwarded downloaded No-IP 2 months ago. But my No-IP does'nt work anymore, who can help me.
I brobly set my server in serverstatus page but it say DangerScape V.4 must first online before you can put it in server status page.
IP is dspk.no-ip.biz does'nt work, I made to a new IP but that IP does'nt work to.
PLZ I need help!

item.title: I have portforwarded and my No-IP does'nt work [help]
item.dc:creator: @dangerscape dangerscape
item.description:
@dangerscape wrote:

I have that all but does’'nt work.

Read full topic
item.source: I have portforwarded and my No-IP does'nt work [help]

item.title: I have portforwarded and my No-IP does'nt work [help]
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

Make sure:

  • Your running your server (runserver.bat)
  • Your NO-IP Duc is running.
  • Sometimes your router MIGHT have a dynamic IP (for example mine changes from 192.168.2.1 to 192.168.2.2, if thats the case you might need to re-portforward)

And when YOU are logging in, don’t type in the no-ip, leave it blank for the IP. The only people who have to use the NO-IP are the people who play it excluding you.

Read full topic
item.source: I have portforwarded and my No-IP does'nt work [help]
